name: Easy Roasted Beef Tenderloin
description: Feeding a crowd? Make it a high-end beef sandwich number. Sit-down dinner? Make it more formal – present whole or sliced on a platter.

ingredients.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning or Montreal Steak Rub

preparation: Bring meat up to room temperature before roasting. Preheat oven to 400° F (205° C).
Rub tenderloin with Seasoning, Sea Salt, and Black Pepper.
Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner, and roast until internal temperature reaches 125° F (50° C) for rare, or 135° F (58° C) for medium-rare, approximately 35–45 minutes.
Remove from oven, and cover. Let stand 15 minutes before slicing.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup cooked grains and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
